I recently tried the future authoring program by Dr. Jordan B. Peterson. It added more depth to my current structure of navigating the complexity of the future. If you want to try it check out this link

One Thing You Could Do Better

I would like to create more structure on my ideas - write more or talk about it in videos or podcasts.

I believe this is where my abilities get strengthen as well as create opportunities for starting better conversations with society at large. I am currently developing my present space to do this better in the future or expand my capacity for doing similar things in the future but yeah the present is also a huge task all in its own.

Things to Learn About

Learning how to play the guitar has been on my bucket list for 35 years now and I’m taking incremental steps on tackling it. I wish to play my future wife a song or two and this will be a goal of mine this year. In five years, I wish to learn how to build a better platform in YouTube or my blog so I can spread better ideas and be a counter-culture to the narrative that is currently playing in society at large.

Improve Your Habits

What habits would you like to improve?

At school? - I’m already working

At work? - Maybe focus on improving my communication skills, listen more than too much speaking.

With friends and family? Communicate more to them. This is ultimately hard for me to do especially that I’m quite far away from my home country.

For your health? Run, Exercise and Eat well. Just continue to learn more about the Ketogenic diet. Prepare for the next marathon.

With regards to smoking/alcohol/drug use? I will continue to do what I have started.

Your Social Life in the Future

I want to have friends that are listening to the kind of ideas that I truly believe and uphold. I guess modern society fails to harness people that are capable to do such now especially with social media and conventional news media pushing wrong narratives. I want to expand relationships with people who value gratitude, sacrifices, honesty and responsibility.

Your Leisure Activity in the Future

Art or learn how to write, draw, play the guitar - anything about improving my artistic capacity. I found to believe that the way I improved on this area of my abilities have enabled me to improve in other aspects of my life - work, ideation process, making connections with people and solving problems. I hope to continue again building the habit of writing, sketching and include playing the guitar - A LOT!!

Your Family Life in the Future

The kind of partner suitable for me is one that..

  • Have to be highly open minded - as most of what I do and think about is not for the average person
  • Prioritizes health.
  • Prioritizes building solutions or finding them instead of taking too much time on thinking about the problem.
  • A risk taker - not as equal as mine but could risk herself loving an over the top risk taker like me.
  • Likes to communicate her deep honest thoughts, trustworthy.
  • TBC

Your Career in the Future

Six months and Two years - Continue crushing at my work as an accountant in Cayman Islands

Five years - I do not know how complex the answer but now I’m taking all steps to be as robust in the future so I have more options when the need arises. I can code, sing, write, communicate and I believe the more I improve- the more I can be of help for the future to any company or platform or advocacy.

Qualities You Admire

I admire Dr. Peterson a lot. He is so honest in his words and actions. He is very open to ideas and has a deep understanding of what he is talking about. He also admits that if he does not have answers to questions and is quite remarkable even for a person who have deep dived the question of who we really are as humans- it cuts across my soul to admire such remarkable courage in such admission.

The Ideal Future

Who do you want to be? I want to be a responsible person for myself, for my wife/girlfriend, for my friends, for my family and society at large.

What do you want to do? I want to be a net positive impact to everyone in my inner circle and society at large so whatever creative ability I have should be maximized as far as I can. I want to train my conscious and subconscious mind to improve my capacity to do more.

Where do you want to end up? I want to end up where I can be of use for society and the future of humanity. It starts with my individual responsibilities up to my personal family and up to society at large. I want to help prove the truth that this is the best way forward for our own stories and even the future that is becoming to be increasingly complex.

Why do you want these things? I believe this is the best things that I can achieve in my lifetime and can be passed on to future generations.

How do you plan to achieve your goals? Training daily - focusing on improving my health, mind and body properly. Habits that matter, great habits that provide great results.

When will you put your plans into action? I have started last year. I am continuing it even through - thus even trying this platform even so as to check if my structure is somewhat at par as the standards set by experts like. Dr. Jordan Peterson.

A Future to Avoid

I want to avoid not having a family of my own. This is not on par of the potential of each individual human being to bear life and be of part of a much bigger strata of participation to the game of life that started 3.5 billion years ago.

I want to avoid not trying to become more creative. There is genuine productivity whenever I write, code and sketch. I also will not achieve the highest level of genetic lineage if I fail to access my untapped potential.

I don’t want to die without being able to write or say what I needed to say to my family or society at large. Losing the opportunity for someone who can see more truth and not say them is a total loss to history in my estimation. I feel tremendous fear on this thought but I guess one of the key steps forward is writing about this like I’m doing now in this writing program.

I am avoiding the potential in participating in catastrophic scale - climate denial, cognitive denial or even totalitarian or communism. We have watched a lot of suffering in the 20th century or even farther back into the past. We have totally paid this abundance in the modern society by tremendous amount of death - unquantifiable oceans of blood originating from millions and millions of years.
